description: The Permanent Mission of Canada in Geneva, Switzerland requires cleaning services in accordance with best commercial practices and industry standards.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
full_summary:
# Cleaning Services Contract Opportunity

## Announcement

The Permanent Mission of Canada in Geneva, Switzerland is seeking a service provider to fulfill its cleaning services needs. This Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation is a competitive and open bidding process.

## Service Requirements

The successful service provider will be responsible for providing cleaning services for the 2600 m2 permanent mission building, located at 5 Avenue de l'Ariana, Geneva, Switzerland. This includes regular and detailed cleaning services of all areas within the building, such as the basement, ground floor, and one upper floor.

## Contract Type

The award will be made based on a Request for Proposal and an evaluation will be conducted to determine the best value for the government.

## Key Dates

* The tender closing date is November 20th, 2023, at 14:00:00.
* The expected contract start date is not specified.

## Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

## Contact Information

For any information, please contact:

Véronique Mussely
Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 203-0000

## Attachments

The tender package and additional documentation can be found at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22691/23-240050---rfp_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22691/23-240050---ddp.pdf

The Permanent Mission of Canada in Geneva seeks a service provider to provide cleaning services as specified above. This RFP solicitation is open to qualified and experienced service providers who can meet the needs of the permanent mission. The successful provider will be awarded the contract based on the best value to the government. The deadline for submitting a proposal is November 20th, 2023, at 14:00:00.
